structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 58. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Condemnation by city of fourth class for purpose of straightening or widening a creek.
